Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from the E polyprotein of DENV)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31351847]Dengue virus(DENV):inhibition of DENV infection in LLCKM-2 monkey kidney epithelial cells(25±8% inhibition at 42.6 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide may play roles in protein-protein rearrangements or bilayer membrane interactions during the entry and fusion process and thus inhibit infection of DENV or WNV.

Literature.Title: Peptide derivatives as inhibitors of NS2B-NS3 protease from Dengue, West Nile, and Zika flaviviruses.
Literature.Author: da Silva-Júnior EF, de Araújo-Júnior JX.
